# Phase 2 EZ113-240570: Western Constance Cove Remediation
## Solicitation Details
### Reference Number
WS4264093588-Doc4354725453

### Solicitation Number
WS4264093588

### Tender Status
**Expired**

### Amendment Details
* Amendment Number: 9
* Amendment Date: 2024-01-22

## Tender Details
### Title
Phase 2 EZ113-240570: Western Constance Cove Remediation

### Publication Date
2023-12-14

### Tender Closing Date
2024-01-24 14:00:00

### Expected Contract Start Date
2024-02-16

### Expected Contract End Date
2024-06-15

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to suppliers that are compliant with the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Procurement Details
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Procurement Category: Construction Services

## Regions of Operation and Delivery
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia, Canada

## Contracting Entity
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact: Tian Lam, [tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). Please note that phone and fax numbers are not provided.
